title: Top Biden adviser on AI and authoritarianism
description: Arati Prabhakar talks to Fast Company about what the rise of artificial intelligence will mean for the future of democracy.
content: Camps are finally emerging in the big fight over whether and how to regulate AI. President Donald Trump earlier this week declared that he would block local officials who try to regulate the technology; according to a draft executive order leaked on ... [11677 chars]

title: Benedict Cumberbatch says he feels "pretty depressed" about AI in the film industry and thinks we're "vanilla-fying" the "thing that makes us human"
description: The star of The Imitation Game chimes in on artificial intelligence
content: More of Hollywood’s finest are speaking up against the use of AI in the industry. Guillermo del Toro has assured that he’d rather die than use it, and now Benedict Cumberbatch has had a few words to say on the matter. During a Reddit AMA, the Doctor ... [1657 chars]

title: UAE cements global AI leadership with focus on human capital, training
description: The UAE is strengthening its leadership in Artificial Intelligence by investing in education, training, and research to build skilled national talent. Reports show the country leading the region in AI readiness and adoption, supported by major initiatives, universities, and government-backed programmes.
content: Abu Dhabi [UAE], November 22 (ANI/WAM): The United Arab Emirates is reinforcing its leading position in developing national expertise in Artificial Intelligence (AI) through strategic initiatives aimed at building human capital and preparing a genera... [3022 chars]

title: IEO Crypto Whale Launches Six Cutting-Edge Projects to Reshape the Web3 Landscape
description: As the global digital asset industry continues to evolve rapidly, IEO Crypto Whale has officially launched six of its internally incubated projects: YAMW, OSAK, SXPA, SAJS, MKAL and XSAW. title: Bernie Sanders Asks Whether AI Will Really Serve Workers Or 'What Mr Musk And Mr Bezos Have In Mind' As Geoffrey Hinton Reveals The Real Risk
description: Bernie Sanders and AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton warned that while artificial intelligence could greatly benefit society, its future depends on whether it's shaped for the public good or aligned with "what Mr. Musk and Mr. Bezos have in mind," as Washington moves to tighten federal control over the technology.
content: This week, in a wide-ranging discussion at Georgetown University, Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt) and AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton warned that artificial intelligence could improve lives — but only if it's controlled by people whose interests extend beyond ... [3300 chars]

title: Man referred to prosecutors for alleged copyright infringement of AI image
description: A 27-year-old man has been referred to prosecutors on suspicion of copying an image created by another person via specific prompts given to an artificial intelligence model, local police said. While he was not arrested, the case is likely the first of its kind to be sent to prosecutors over…
content:
A 27-year-old man has been referred to prosecutors on suspicion of copying an image created by another person via specific prompts given to an artificial intelligence model, local police said.

title: White House pauses executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on AI
description: The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funds.
content:
The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funds, two sources said on Friday.
The draft order, which Reuters reported on earlier... [2767 chars]

title: U.S. considering letting Nvidia sell H200 chips to China
description: The Trump administration is considering greenlighting sales of Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, people familiar with the matter said.
content:
The Trump administration is considering greenlighting sales of Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, people familiar with the matter said, as a bilateral detente boosts prospects for exports of advanced U.S. technology to China.

title: The Science Behind Hyper-Realistic Face Swaps: Why Today’s AI Looks So Convincing
description: Artificial intelligence has transformed the way digital media is created, edited, and shared. One of the most fascinating breakthroughs is hyper realistic face swap technology.
